mapper.insert: insert into db_pictureattribute (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', UPLOADFLAG, FTPIP, FTPUSERNAME, FTPPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ATTRIBUTEID, THISURL, FTPURL ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftpip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftpusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ftppassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thisurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{ftpurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update db_pictureattribute set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADFLAG = #{uploadflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTPIP = #{ftpip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTPUSERNAME = #{ftpusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTPPASSWORD = #{ftppassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTRIBUTEID = #{attributeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THISURL = #{thisurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FTPURL = #{ftpurl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', UPLOADFLAG, FTPIP, FTPUSERNAME, FTPPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ATTRIBUTEID, THISURL, FTPURL from db_pictureattribute where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', UPLOADFLAG, FTPIP, FTPUSERNAME, FTPPASSWORD, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, CORPID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, ATTRIBUTEID, THISURL, FTPURL from db_pictureattribute
